definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: His article has the strong feeling of Chinese traditional painting especially in emotion.
sentences.chinese: 作品具有很強的水墨文化情結，尤其在“氣韻”方面。

sentences.english: Spirit-resonance is the connotation and aesthetic category of artistic works.
sentences.chinese: 氣韻生動是文藝作品的精神內涵和審美範疇。

sentences.english: "Flavor" is a kind of structure form of abstract and implying.
sentences.chinese: “氣韻”就是一種抽象而有意味的結構形態。

sentences.english: Vivid manner in Nature becomes the spiritual homestead for free life.
sentences.chinese: 氣韻生動的自然成爲人類追求的自由生命的精神家園。

sentences.english: In fact, Hong Ling uses "imagery" to grasp the "spirit" of the painting.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，洪凌是借“意象”來把握畫面裏的氣韻。

sentences.english: The category of "Qiyun" reflects the characteristic of poetic thinking of the aesthetic culture of ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 氣韻範疇顯現出中國審美文化的詩性思維特徵。

sentences.english: In his works so that people comprehend the spirit of the Chinese Taoist culture of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 在作品中，讓人們感悟到中國道教文化的氣韻之美。

sentences.english: The vivid artistic conception is a traditional topic of Chinese drawing.
sentences.chinese: 氣韻生動是中國畫論一個傳統話題。

definition: charm or grace (in poetry or art)
